body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is William Martinez and the customer's name is Samantha Washington.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is William Martinez, and I'm with Phat Hogs, your one-stop motorcycle dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi William, I'm Samantha Washington. I've been looking into buying a motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Samantha! What kind of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm not sure yet. I just want something reliable and easy to ride.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds like a good plan! If you don't mind me asking, could you please provide me with your zip code? It helps us find the best options for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two zero one zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also let me know your preferred contact number, just in case we need to follow up?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's three zero three, five zero one, four two one seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Samantha! You've provided very helpful information. We have some excellent options that match your needs.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, William! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, Samantha. I look forward to helping you find the perfect motorcycle!
